name: µSploit Framework
body:
### Welcome to µSploit Framework home page
This is official page of µSploit Framework project.

Build status: [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/4shadoww/usploit.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/4shadoww/usploit)

µSploit is basic penetration testing tool.

#### Basic features:

* Run exploits
* Simple UI
* Includes scapy
* Easy to use
* Easy to write your own exploit (module)
* Scripting

### Available modules:
* apache_users
* arp_dos
* arp_spoof
* bluetooth_pod
* cloudflare_resolver
* dir_scanner
* dns_spoof
* email_bomber
* hostname_resolver
* mac_spoof
* mitm
* network_kill
* pma_scanner
* port_scanner
* web_killer
* wifi_jammer

#### Screenshots:
![screenshot](http://usploitproject.xyz/usploit1.0.1.png)

#### Wiki:
[Wiki page](https://github.com/4shadoww/usploit/wiki)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
